result.ga: Mhill sí uirthi féin é

result.html: Mhill sí uirthi féin éShe only had herself to blame.
result.ponchtml: Ṁill sí uirṫi féin éShe only had herself to blame.

result.eng: It seems she only had one duty.
result.ga: Ní raibh ach dualgas amháin uirthi is cosúil
result.orig: Ní raibh ach dualgas amháin uirthi is cosúil
result.html: Ní raibh ach dualgas amháin uirthi is cosúilIt seems she only had one duty.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ aċ dualgas aṁáin uirṫi is cosúilIt seems she only had one duty.

result.eng: They had strong Slavic accents.
result.ga: Bhí canúintí láidre Slavacha acu
result.orig: Bhí canúintí láidre Slavacha acu
result.html: Bhí canúintí láidre Slavacha acuThey had strong Slavic accents.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí canúintí láidre Slavaċa acuThey had strong Slavic accents.

result.eng: They had a two-year old child.
result.ga: Bhí páiste dhá bhliain d'aois acu
result.orig: Bhí páiste dhá bhliain d'aois acu
result.html: Bhí páiste dhá bhliain d'aois acuThey had a two-year old child.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí páiste ḋá ḃliain d'aois acuThey had a two-year old child.

result.eng: Along with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.
result.ga: Fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadh
result.orig: Fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadh
result.html: Fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadhAlong with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.
result.ponchtml: Fara aire a ṫaḃairt don leanḃ ḃí uirṫi an teaċ a ġlanaḋAlong with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.

result.eng: She had responsibility for the cooking, the washing and the ironing.
result.ga: Bhí cúram na cócaireachta an níocháin is na hiarnála uirthi
result.orig: Bhí cúram na cócaireachta an níocháin is na hiarnála uirthi
result.html: Bhí cúram na cócaireachta an níocháin is na hiarnála uirthiShe had responsibility for the cooking, the washing and the ironing.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí cúram na cócaireaċta an níoċáin is na hiarnála uirṫiShe had responsibility for the cooking, the washing and the ironing.

result.eng: It wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maith
result.orig: Níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh ag na Naitsithe chomh maith

result.ponchtml: Níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an Ḟrainc ina seilḃ ag na Naitsiṫe ċoṁ maiṫIt wasn't long before the Nazis had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: It is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.
result.ga: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainn
result.orig: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainn
result.html: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainnIt is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.
result.ponchtml: Is trua naċ raiḃ JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a ḃí ag an gceann a ṫáinig roṁainnIt is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.

result.eng: I wish I had never said that.
result.ga: Faraor go ndúirt mé a leithéid
result.orig: Faraor go ndúirt mé a leithéid
result.html: Faraor go ndúirt mé a leithéidI wish I had never said that.
result.ponchtml: Faraor go ndúirt mé a leiṫéidI wish I had never said that.

result.eng: They were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.
result.ga: Bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i Nua-Eabhrac
result.orig: Bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i Nua-Eabhrac
result.html: Bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i Nua-EabhracThey were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.
result.ponchtml: Ḃíoṫas ag fógairt go raiḃ eitleán tar éis doċar a ḋéanaṁ d'ḟoirgneaṁ i Nua-EaḃracThey were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.

result.eng: Central to the planning was Mohammad Atta, an Egyptian who had devoted himself to Islamic extremism as a student in Germany.
result.ga: Lárnach sa phleanáil bhí Mohammad Atta Éigipteach a chuaigh le hantoisceachas Ioslamach agus é ina mhac léinn sa Ghearmáin
result.orig: Lárnach sa phleanáil bhí Mohammad Atta Éigipteach a chuaigh le hantoisceachas Ioslamach agus é ina mhac léinn sa Ghearmáin
result.html: Lárnach sa phleanáil bhí Mohammad Atta Éigipteach a chuaigh le hantoisceachas Ioslamach agus é ina mhac léinn sa GhearmáinCentral to the planning was Mohammad Atta, an Egyptian who had devoted himself to Islamic extremism as a student in Germany.
result.ponchtml: Lárnaċ sa ṗleanáil ḃí Mohammad Atta Éigipteaċ a ċuaiġ le hantoisceaċas Ioslamaċ agus é ina ṁac léinn sa ĠearmáinCentral to the planning was Mohammad Atta, an Egyptian who had devoted himself to Islamic extremism as a student in Germany.

result.eng: He found another person who had flying experience.
result.ga: D'aimsigh sé duine eile a raibh taithí eitilte aige
result.orig: D'aimsigh sé duine eile a raibh taithí eitilte aige
result.html: D'aimsigh sé duine eile a raibh taithí eitilte aigeHe found another person who had flying experience.
result.ponchtml: D'aimsiġ sé duine eile a raiḃ taiṫí eitilte aigeHe found another person who had flying experience.

result.eng: Reports started coming from Washington that the Pentagon had been hit.
result.ga: Thosaigh tuairiscí ag teacht as Washington gur buaileadh an Pentagon
result.orig: Thosaigh tuairiscí ag teacht as Washington gur buaileadh an Pentagon
result.html: Thosaigh tuairiscí ag teacht as Washington gur buaileadh an PentagonReports started coming from Washington that the Pentagon had been hit.
result.ponchtml: Ṫosaiġ tuairiscí ag teaċt as Waẛington gur buaileaḋ an PentagonReports started coming from Washington that the Pentagon had been hit.

result.eng: To wage war against the whole world, especially against countries that had oil.
result.ga: Cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór go háirithe ar thíortha a raibh ola acu
result.orig: Cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór go háirithe ar thíortha a raibh ola acu
result.html: Cogadh a fhearadh ar an domhan mór go háirithe ar thíortha a raibh ola acuTo wage war against the whole world, especially against countries that had oil.
result.ponchtml: Cogaḋ a ḟearaḋ ar an doṁan mór go háiriṫe ar ṫíorṫa a raiḃ ola acuTo wage war against the whole world, especially against countries that had oil.

result.eng: Maybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
result.ga: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimse
result.orig: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimse
result.html: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimseMaybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir go raiḃ a ḟios ag Bin Laden sular ṁaraiġ fórsaí speisialta Ṁeiriceá é gur aṫraiġ sé an doṁan as cuimseMaybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.

result.eng: On my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.
result.ga: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga
result.orig: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga
result.html: Ar mo bhealach ar ais as Éirinn an mhí seo caite rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorgaOn my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.
result.ponchtml: Ar mo ḃealaċ ar ais as Éirinn an ṁí seo caite rinneaḋ scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo ṁéarlorgaOn my way back from Ireland last month, I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints.

result.eng: I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.
result.ga: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tír
result.orig: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tír
result.html: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tírI had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.
result.ponchtml: Rinneaḋ scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo ṁéarlorga mar a ḋéantar le gaċ éinne naċ saoránaċ Meiriceánaċ é ar a ḃealaċ isteaċ sa tírI had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.

result.eng: I had to remove my shoes, my belt and every piece of metal, as well as any liquids and pastes I had.
result.ga: B'éigean dom mo bhróga mo chrios agus gach píosa miotal a bhaint díom maille le pé leachtanna agus taois a bhí agam
result.orig: B'éigean dom mo bhróga mo chrios agus gach píosa miotal a bhaint díom maille le pé leachtanna agus taois a bhí agam
result.html: B'éigean dom mo bhróga mo chrios agus gach píosa miotal a bhaint díom maille le pé leachtanna agus taois a bhí agamI had to remove my shoes, my belt and every piece of metal, as well as any liquids and pastes I had.
result.ponchtml: B'éigean dom mo ḃróga mo ċrios agus gaċ píosa miotal a ḃaint díom maille le pé leaċtanna agus taois a ḃí agamI had to remove my shoes, my belt and every piece of metal, as well as any liquids and pastes I had.

result.eng: Here in New York we had a small earthquake last week.
result.ga: Anseo i Nua-Eabhrac bhí crith beag talún againn an tseachtain seo caite
result.orig: Anseo i Nua-Eabhrac bhí crith beag talún againn an tseachtain seo caite
result.html: Anseo i Nua-Eabhrac bhí crith beag talún againn an tseachtain seo caiteHere in New York we had a small earthquake last week.
result.ponchtml: Anseo i Nua-Eaḃrac ḃí criṫ beag talún againn an tseaċtain seo caiteHere in New York we had a small earthquake last week.

result.eng: She knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
result.ga: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirín
result.orig: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirín
result.html: Thuig sí go maith gur iomaí iriseoir a tógadh amach as an óstán ar chláirínShe knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].
result.ponchtml: Ṫuig sí go maiṫ gur iomaí iriseoir a tógaḋ amaċ as an óstán ar ċláirínShe knew well that many journalists had been carried out of the hotel on a board [ie. dead].

result.eng: Technological progress had created new opportunities.
result.ga: Bhí deiseanna úra cruthaithe ag dul chun cinn teicneolaíoch
result.orig: Bhí deiseanna úra cruthaithe ag dul chun cinn teicneolaíoch
result.html: Bhí deiseanna úra cruthaithe ag dul chun cinn teicneolaíochTechnological progress had created new opportunities.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí deiseanna úra cruṫaiṫe ag dul ċun cinn teicneolaíoċTechnological progress had created new opportunities.

result.eng: It overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
result.ga: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada
result.orig: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fada
result.html: Sháraigh sé cuid mhaith de na fadhbanna seachadta agus rochtana a bhíodh ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fadaIt overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.
result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ sé cuid ṁaiṫ de na faḋbanna seaċadta agus roċtana a ḃíoḋ ina gcrá croí ag iriseoirí le fadaIt overcame a lot of the distribution and access problems that had been bothering journalists for a long time.

result.eng: Because of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ga: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.orig: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costais
result.html: De bharr na bhforbairtí seo bhí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránach a thug deis dó feidhmiú mar iriseoir ar bhonn domhanda agus ar bheagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.
result.ponchtml: De ḃarr na ḃforbairtí seo ḃí bosca uirlisí cumarsáide ag an saoránaċ a ṫug deis dó feiḋmiú mar iriseoir ar ḃonn doṁanda agus ar ḃeagán costaisBecause of these developments, the citizen now had a toolbox that gave him the chance to function as a journalist, globally and at little cost.

result.eng: The Nazis didn't stop with Poland  and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.orig: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.html: Níor stop na Naitsithe leis an bPolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an Fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maithThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: Níor stop na Naitsiṫe leis an bPolainn agus níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an Ḟrainc ina seilḃ acu ċoṁ maiṫThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: He was an Irishman who had been living in America for a long time.
result.ga: Éireannach ab ea é a bhí ina chónaí i Meiriceá le fada
result.orig: Éireannach ab ea é a bhí ina chónaí i Meiriceá le fada

result.ponchtml: Éireannaċ ab ea é a ḃí ina ċónaí i Meiriceá le fadaHe was an Irishman who had been living in America for a long time.

result.eng: He had neither trousers nor anything else on at that time.
result.ga: Ní raibh bríste nó a dhath san am air
result.orig: Ní raibh bríste nó a dhath san am air
result.html: Ní raibh bríste nó a dhath san am airHe had neither trousers nor anything else on at that time.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ bríste nó a ḋaṫ san am airHe had neither trousers nor anything else on at that time.

result.eng: Not tribulation but consolation was in Jamie's heart when he had done his confession.
result.ga: Chan dólás croí ach sólás croí a bhí ar Shéimí nuair a bhí a fhaoiside déanta aige
result.orig: Chan dólás croí ach sólás croí a bhí ar Shéimí nuair a bhí a fhaoiside déanta aige
result.html: Chan dólás croí ach sólás croí a bhí ar Shéimí nuair a bhí a fhaoiside déanta aigeNot tribulation but consolation was in Jamie's heart when he had done his confession.
result.ponchtml: Ċan dólás croí aċ sólás croí a ḃí ar Ṡéimí nuair a ḃí a ḟaoiside déanta aigeNot tribulation but consolation was in Jamie's heart when he had done his confession.

result.eng: Instead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.
result.ga: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aige
result.orig: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aige
result.html: In áit a bheith ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleadh cibé a bhí aigeInstead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.
result.ponchtml: In áit a ḃeiṫ ag cruinniú céille is é rud atá sé ag cailleaḋ cibé a ḃí aigeInstead of gathering sense, what he's doing is losing whatever amount he had.

result.eng: He had a high opinion of him.
result.ga: Shíl sé an dúrud de
result.orig: Shíl sé an dúrud de
result.html: Shíl sé an dúrud deHe had a high opinion of him.
result.ponchtml: Ṡíl sé an dúrud deHe had a high opinion of him.

result.eng: Where he had slept the night.
result.ga: An áit a raibh sé i ndiaidh an oíche a chodladh
result.orig: An áit a raibh sé i ndiaidh an oíche a chodladh
result.html: An áit a raibh sé i ndiaidh an oíche a chodladhWhere he had slept the night.
result.ponchtml: An áit a raiḃ sé i ndiaiḋ an oíċe a ċodlaḋWhere he had slept the night.

result.eng: Her eyes were red from how much she had been crying.
result.ga: Bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aici
result.orig: Bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aici
result.html: Bhí a dhá shúil dearg ar mhéad is a bhí caointe aiciHer eyes were red from how much she had been crying.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a ḋá ẛúil dearg ar ṁéad is a ḃí caointe aiciHer eyes were red from how much she had been crying.

result.eng: They haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ga: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.orig: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.html: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair siad aon ġreim le níl a ḟios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.

result.eng: Going to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.
result.ga: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadh
result.orig: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadh
result.html: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadhGoing to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḋoiliġ a ġaḃáil ċun faoiside Ina ḋiaiḋ sin dar leis féin go gcaiṫfeaḋ sé an gealltanas a ċoṁlíonaḋGoing to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.

result.eng: Maybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ga: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.orig: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.html: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir naċ mbeaḋ sé mar seo an teaġlaċ á cur as seilḃ da mbíoḋ sé féin níos táḃaċtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.

result.eng: He had to marry Babaí.
result.ga: Bhí aige le Babaí a phósadh
result.orig: Bhí aige le Babaí a phósadh
result.html: Bhí aige le Babaí a phósadhHe had to marry Babaí.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí aige le Babaí a ṗósaḋHe had to marry Babaí.

result.eng: There is no describing the love I had for that girl.
result.ga: Níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaí
result.orig: Níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaí
result.html: Níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaíThere is no describing the love I had for that girl.
result.ponchtml: Níl léaṁ nó scríoḃ nó inse béil ar an ġrá a ṫug mise don ċailín udaíThere is no describing the love I had for that girl.

result.eng: Babaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ga: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.orig: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.html: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ponchtml: Dar le Babaí gurḃ é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aiṫne aċ ní raiḃ dul aici smaoineaṁ cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
